title: Part writing from Roman numerals in G major U6F2

content.question: Write the following progression in four voices, following eighteenth-century voice-leading procedures. Continue logically from the spacing of the first chord. Do not add embellishments unless indicated by the Roman and Arabic numerals. Use only quarter and half notes. Suggested time: 10 minutes.

frqParts.text: Write the following progression in four voices, following eighteenth-century voice-leading procedures. Continue logically from the spacing of the first chord. Do not add embellishments unless indicated by the Roman and Arabic numerals. Use only quarter and half notes. Suggested time: 10 minutes.

unit.text: 4: Harmony and Voice Leading I - Chord Function, Cadence, and Phrase

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Complete a four-part harmonic progression based on the Roman numeral analysis provided.
